title: Casting Spells Too Fast?
body:
I thought my cheap office keyboard wasn't registering my keystrokes fast enough, so I went and bought a Logitech G910 Mechanical Gaming Keyboard and I'm still having the same issue. I think I'm simply trying to do two things at once. 

I'm trying to practice the Shurima Shuffle with Azir, but  I'm trying to do it all at once. Most people plant the soldier and then walk away from it and then (E>Q.) But I'm trying to (W>E>Q) all at once and nothing happens. In the video I attempt it 7x before it works. (See video)

I have to press W, then left-click to place the soldier, then press E then Q. 

I must be left-clicking and pressing E at the exact same time? I thought it was my cheap keyboard so I decided to buy a mechanical keyboard (Logitech G910) but the same thing happens.

*Even if I'm not doing the Shurmia Shuffle, just W>left-click>Q, then the left-click and Q don't work. Do I just need to practice doing it slower?

replies.body: i have that issue with ez on occasion. ewq, and sometimes i just sit there and throw a w. the game doesnt register my intensity of how bad i wanna thunderlord a bich.

Do you have the option turned on where you can hold the key to see the range indicator? If so try turning that off. I had to turn it off because if I pressed keys to quick it wouldn't register my button press.

> [{quoted}](name=Zezockary,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EH50A2Ii,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-12T13:48:10.800+0000)
>
> Do you have the option turned on where you can hold the key to see the range indicator? If so try turning that off. I had to turn it off because if I pressed keys to quick it wouldn't register my button press.

Hmm.. I haven't changed any settings so everything is on default.

Oh, well in that case you should try turning smart cast on in your settings.

Basically, instead of left clicking to cast your spell as soon as you hit the button it will cast the spell targeting your mouse.

Once you get the hang of it it will make everything so much easier and faster.

There's an option in the client that allows spell to be casted without left clicking (Smarcast) and one that will cast a pressed spell if you press another one.

They're both under "Hotkeys", they are the first two boxes under the big part where there are the basic keybindings.
